sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <collection>global</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>SNC Baseline Filter</name> <order>100</order> <priority/> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[// // Get a filter for baseline // function getBaseFilter(baseline) { var answer = null; if (baseline != null && baseline != '') { var base = new GlideRecord('cmdb_baseline'); base.addQuery('name', baseline); base.query(); if (base.next()) answer = base.sys_created_on; } if (answer == null) { var base = new GlideRecord('cmdb_baseline'); base.orderByDesc('sys_created_on'); base.query(); if (base.next()) answer = base.sys_created_on; } return answer; }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2006-02-10 01:25:57</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>10273615a9fe3dba00612154ff36846c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>SNC Baseline Filter</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Configuration Management (CMDB)" source="com.snc.cmdb">8f64bce83c31311068bcf327dfe37f7e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_10273615a9fe3dba00612154ff36846c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>pat.casey</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2009-10-30 15:32:19</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when/> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=10273615a9fe3dba00612154ff36846c"/> </record_update>
